name: Grim Syndicate: Halloween Badge Holders
description:
Spoopy season is upon us, and here at the Ethereal Transport Authority (ETA) office we take it very seriouslyâ€”starting with Halloween-themed badge holders for our Reaper Agents!


Duplicate this file to get yours now. With 6 types of badge holders available, you can customize to your heart's content.


Twitter banner also set up so you can update your social media, because who doesn't want to share these lil' horrors?


Inspired by the Grim Syndicate.
